page.title: 15CLUBS AND SOCIETIES,DRAYTON
page.content: In a survey undertaken by the first year class in the Middle School, 45 clubs and societies were counted in the Drayton area,catering for the widest possible range of ages and interests.Young children can join the {Playgroup}before progressing to the {Cubs or Brownies,}and thence to{Scouts and{Guides.}There are numerous{sports clubs for young adults and an{Over- {Sixty club}and the{Good Companions}for the elderly.There are also specialist clubs,catering for such hobbies as {pigeon racing, patchwork quilts}and {rabbits}and{cavies. {Venues}for these clubs include the leisure centre in the village,the Methodist Church Hall and the village hall,outdoor sports being played on the village playing fields.Clubs are a vital part of the community,especially for the young and the elderly.
